data.title: Are you gaming too much?
data.description:
Think you might be gaming too much?
Take the quiz to find out.

q.text: Do you game 24 hours or more per week?
Do you think about gaming when you aren't online, and feel like you can't wait to get home to play?
Do you game when you're supposed to be sleeping?
Do you feel too tired to go to school because you're gaming late at night?
Do you have more friends online than you do in real life?
Have you ever felt guilty about how much you game?
Do you feel annoyed when others say you game too much?

data.scores:
Your Score

If you answered ‘yes’ to four or more of these questions, your gaming might be getting out of hand.

Click here for tips that can help.
